deposits.pageTitleDescription: Only crypto currencies that have a wallet created can be used to deposit.
deposits.supportedFiles: Supported files types: pdf, jpg, png.
deposits.transferInstructionsMessage1: 1. Initiate a bank transfer using the details provided on the right.
deposits.transferInstructionsMessage2: 2. In the reference or message field of the bank transfer, be sure to include the reference code {{customer_code}}. Failure to include the code will lead to delays in processing your deposit.
deposits.transferInstructionsMessage3: 3. Before initiating the transfer, carefully double-check the accuracy of the provided bank details.
deposits.transferInstructionsMessage4: 4. Please note that any applicable fees are determined by your bank.
deposits.addressNotExist: Address for selected asset does not exist
deposits.cryptoSummaryDisclaimer: Depositing any asset other than the specified one at this address will result in a loss of your funds.
deposits.assureSelectedNetwork: Assure selected network is compatible with your asset.
fiatSummaryDisclaimer: Deposits may take up to 3 business days.
You will be notified via email upon receipt. Contact
if you have any questions or need further assistance.

withdrawals.pageTitleDescription: Only crypto currencies that have a wallet created and address approved can be used to withdraw.
withdrawals.info: Your withdrawal balance depends on amounts settled in your wallet. Settlement cycles happen daily at end of CET business day (GMT+1).
withdrawals.balanceDisclaimer: Only assets with a balance will be displayed in the list.
withdrawals.reviewWithdrawMessage: Fees are deducted from your EUR balance. Those are equivalent to 0.5% of the withdrawn amount.
withdrawals.cryptoSummaryDisclaimer: Withdrawing any other asset on this address
withdrawals.cryptoSummaryDisclaimerBold: will result in loss of funds.
fiatSummaryDisclaimer: Withdrawals may take up to 3 business days.
You will be notified via email upon withdraw. Contact
if you have any questions or need further assistance.
withdrawals.selectCurrencyMessage: Select type of currency to add an address.
withdrawals.currencyDisclaimer1: If the currency you select do not have a wallet created yet,
withdrawals.currencyDisclaimer2: you will be asked to create a wallet first.
withdrawals.addressNotExist: Address for selected asset does not exist

addresses.pageTitleDescription: Only approved addresses can be used to withdraw.
addresses.label: Label

banks.pageTitleDescription: Only bank accounts listed on this section can be used to withdraw.

delete-address-backdrop.verifyViewSubtitle: Once removed, you will not be able to withdraw to this address using Neutral.
delete-address-backdrop.discalimerList1: 1. You will no longer be able to withdraw funds to this address.
delete-address-backdrop.discalimerList2: 2. You will need to add and approve this address again if you want to use it for future withdrawals.
delete-address-backdrop.successViewSubtitle: Your address will be removed from the list.
delete-address-backdrop.errorViewSubtitle: Please try again. If this issue persist, contact support.

add-new-address-backdrop.addnewWalletAddressMessageEmail: Only approved addresses can be used to withdraw.
add-new-address-backdrop.label: Label
add-new-address-backdrop.whitelistAddressMessage1: Once added, your address needs to be approved.
add-new-address-backdrop.whitelistAddressMessage2: Approval may take up to 1 business days.
add-new-address-backdrop.verifyViewSubtitle: Enter the verification code sent to your email.
add-new-address-backdrop.verifyWalletAddressMessageAuthenticator: Enter the code shown in your authenticator app.
add-new-address-backdrop.successViewSubtitle: Address approval may take up to 1 business days. You will be notified via email upon approval.
add-new-address-backdrop.errorViewSubtitle: Please try again. If this issue persist, contact support.

request-withdrawal-backdrop.verifyViewSubtitle: Enter the code shown in your authenticator app.
request-withdrawal-backdrop.successViewSubtitle: You can review your transaction status in the history.
request-withdrawal-backdrop.errorViewSubtitle: Please try again. If this issue persist, contact support.
